snippet.title: Hidden Facade Trailer | DDD Games
snippet.description:
Hidden Facade Trailer | DDD Games - April 19th

Throughout the game, you can play as all 2 main characters, and they all have a story to tell, but don’t let your eyes and ears deceive you. 2 stories bleed together, and it’s up to you to make sense of this tragic tale before the game ends. Who you believe is up to you, but everybody’s got a secret. Who will lie to you first?
